lead_paragraph: Manchester City manager Manuel Pellegrini believes tiredness was behind their 3-0 defeat by Liverpool on Wednesday after a third successive Premier League loss put a hefty dent in their faltering title hopes.

headline.print_headline: Pellegrini Bemoans City Fatigue as Liverpool Go 'Boom'
headline.main: Pellegrini Bemoans City Fatigue as Liverpool Go 'Boom'

snippet: Manchester City manager Manuel Pellegrini believes tiredness was behind their 3-0 defeat by Liverpool on Wednesday after a third successive Premier League loss put a hefty dent in their faltering title hopes....
